title: Best Restaurants in Monterosso al Mare

seo.title: Monterosso Restaurants 2025 | Best Dining in Cinque Terre
seo.description: Discover the best restaurants in Monterosso al Mare. Beach dining, traditional trattorias, and award-winning seafood.

body.title: Restaurants in Monterosso
body.subtitle: The largest selection of restaurants in Cinque Terre. From beachfront dining to traditional family trattorias.

features.title: Ristorante Miky
features.description: Award-winning fine dining. Creative seafood in elegant setting.

features.title: L'Ancora della Tortuga
features.description: Fresh fish on Fegina beach. Perfect for sunset dinners.

features.title: Trattoria La Grotta
features.description: Traditional Ligurian cooking in a cave-like setting.

features.title: Enoteca da Eliseo
features.description: Wine bar with local vintages and small plates.

features.title: Ristorante Ciak
features.description: Harbor views and fresh seafood daily.

features.title: Al Pozzo
features.description: Handmade pasta in the old town center.
